text: Camilo Monroy Restrepo (born September 25, 1998) is a Colombian footballer who currently plays for Rio Grande Valley FC Toros on loan from América de Cali. ==Career== === Professional === Monroy joined Houston Dynamo's United Soccer League affiliate Rio Grande Valley FC Toros on March 23, 2017 from América de Cali. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Colombian footballers Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Living people Category:Rio Grande Valley FC Toros players Category:USL Championship players
title: Camilo Monroy
